channel.title: How Do I Add.....?
channel.description: How do I add NPC's to my home in Edgeville? I know it's somewhere in the client.java (atleast I think) but I need NPC's to code into my server and I need them to say, "Welcome to GodexScape!" (my server name) . And also, does anyone know the code for a Genie?

item.title: How Do I Add.....?
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

Autospawn and use NPCHandler to make them speak, there are tutorials in the tutorial section if you need further help.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Add.....?
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

How do I add NPC’s to my home in Edgeville? I know it’s somewhere in the client.java (atleast I think) but I need NPC’s to code into my server and I need them to say, “Welcome to GodexScape!” (my server name) . And also, does anyone know the code for a Genie?
